title: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman Crawley thumb drive

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

06/08/2023
Subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: McLennan County Administrator Justin Chapman HR Johnathan Crawley

I need another thumbdrive of this you already have it, please let me know and we will pick it up.
 



Portal
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Personnel records and final employment records on Johnathan Crawley, former MCSO deputy.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

title: Chicago Lead Service Line Inventory Report: Adding zip codes

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Per previous FOIA request T050997 "Chicago Lead Service Line Inventory Report (Chicago Department Of Streets And Sanitation)", I request the addition of zip code to the deidentified  block information.

Many thanks in advance and best regards,

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mary Oliver

title: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman CHARLOTTE MCNAMARA KEY CARD

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman CHARLOTTE MCNAMARA KEY CARD
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

charlotte's key card access information, when she received it, restrictions, does she still have it

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
